s_synopsis: Fatal Fury: Wild Ambition re-tells the story of Terry and Andy Bogard's fight to avenge their father's death at the hands of Geese Howard with the use of a fully polygonal engine. The game is a 3D one-on-one fighting game that uses the standard Fatal Fury control scheme under a brand new 3D arena. Choose from a selection of classic Fatal Fury characters that includes 2 all-new characters, plus 2 secret guest stars.
